event.title: USPS TRACKING
event.description:
USPS, which is abbreviated as United States Postal Service is an independent and a self-supporting federal agency in the United States is the best and most popular delivery service that reaches every address in the country among 155 million houses, industries, and several Post Office Boxes. USPS is an incredible Postal Service that takes no tax dollars for functioning expenditures and depends on the sale of stamp price, products, and facilities to invest its procedures.

As of now, the United States Postal Service has more than 31,600 marketing locations all over the globe. USPS is the most regularly visited website in the federal government. The official website of United States Postal Services is usps.com wherein this postal service has yearly revenue of approximately $69 billion. Here is everything you need to know about the United States Postal and Courier services offered by USPS to all the customers across the world.

The United States Postal Service, which is also referred to as thePostal Service, Post Office, U.S. Mail is often called as USPS in short. The United States postal Service is a self-governing agency which is headquartered in Washington, D.C. in the United States. The United State government offering this USPS Tracking Postal Service is responsible for delivering the best postal service to all its customers and people residing in the United States. USPS Tracking is one of the fewer government agencies explicitly accredited by the United States Constitution.

The USPS Tracking Postal Service was established in the month of July 1 in the year 1970. It has been almost 46 years to found the USPS international courier service in the United States. In the year 2015, the USPS has more than 617,254 active employees and in the year 2014, this postal service has operated more than 211,264 vehicles. The USPS is the operator of the leading national vehicle convoy across the world.

Originally, this United States Postal Service was started by the US government in a legal way in order to serve all the citizens of the US, irrespective of topography, at standard price and excellence. The USPS renders almost 47 percent of the entire mail service available in the world. In the USPS Postal Service, there are more than half a millions official employees and this postal and courier service is regarded as one of the largest post offices with a large number of employees across the nation.

Though USPS offers incredible services to its customers and all the citizens of the US, it still rivals against various private package delivery services available in the world that include the United Parcel Service (UPS) and FedEx Express. The United States Postal Service is considered as the best Postal service across the world with massive computer networks that links more than 30, 000 facilities and it helps make communication quite potential among hundreds and thousands of employees working in this independent agency.
